title: Random spiking lag since new map?
body:
Just generally reaching out for comment from riot about the state of oceanic servers and whether any issues have arisen since the implementation of the new summoner's rift beta? Are we likely to see the same downtime as NA has experienced as the patch is migrated?

Have looked for net issues with other services but the fact remains that the lag is only occurring with league of legends and began since the implementation of the new map.

replies.body: nope, confirmed been getting ping spikes up to 400 ping when no one is home or on the net. Never had these smaller amounts of ping spikes since 4.20. I can guarantee you there is something happening outside client side networking.

Hi Athorell,

So far, servers have been behaving normally, and we are keeping a close eye on connectivity between our players and our servers.  On the client side of things, between when we released to Team Builder, and when we released to Normals and Ranked, we released fixes to a few performance issues that were found with the updated rift.

The recent NA downtime was actually for some planned hardware maintenance, and was not directly related to the 4.20 update.

-Mindstar
